issue.title: [C++][Compute] Provide a registry for ExecNode implementations
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13482](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13482). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
ExecNodes' factory functions are confusingly non-uniform, which means a lot of boilerplate when composing them into even a simple ExecPlan. Providing a standard factory interface for these and a registry in which to store them by name will simplify declaration of ExecPlans.
